name: MAKE IT as an Artist
description: Super happy fun time artist simulator!!!
minimum_requirements: OS: 32- and 64-bit (unless noted): Microsoft® Windows® XP (32-bit), Windows Vista® (32-bit), Windows 7, Windows 8.x and Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel® Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbooks Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 11 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 32- and 64-bit (unless noted): Microsoft® Windows® XP (32-bit), Windows Vista® (32-bit), Windows 7, Windows 8.x and Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel® Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbooks Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 11 MB available space
